abstracts.cdata!:
The Grassroots Development Initiatives
            Project : (i) grant financing for NGO (Non-Government
            Organizations) sponsored community based projects, to be
            selected in accordance with agreed eligibility criteria;
            (ii) technical support services to the steering committee
            for review and evaluation of project proposals, and
            implementation monitoring; (iii) assistance to the PDLP
            (Programme de Developpement Local et Participatif) /NGO
            division in MPM (Ministry of Planning and Mines) to provide
            an effective government liaison and resource center, and for
            project management; and (iv) assistance to the NGO
            community, principally channelled through the NGO
            association (FONGTO) to strengthen coordination and
            complementarity among NGO's, and to carry out a program
            to reinforce the capacity of individual NGOs in planning,
            implementation, and management of their operations.
